title: The new status bar
body:
Hey guys, is it me, or do people find the new status bar hard to see and annoying to keep track of? Personally I find it really disrupts my play style as it doesn't allow me to quickly glance right down towards my skillbar to see the duration of effects on me. 

A major problem with the new tiny icons stuffed in a corner is that I enjoy playing graves, but with the new status bar, I find it difficult to keep track of my passive to ensure when to hit a minion to keep it up.

@Riot, if possible, can you guys add an option to change the location of the status bars? I would greatly appreciate the option, along with many people I know of. 

Thanks for reading and have a nice day. :)

replies.body:
+1
I don't like it being split up either, I always get confused how many potions are active on me at one time....etc

Maybe I just need to get used to it, but I much preferred when all buffs were located in one spot and not needing to think about where to quickly glance.
